content:
This obviously is a topic that can be of interest here, being one of the early and most developed branches of ACT, and I just started a course on it (very egocentric though) on Twitter: https://twitter.com/coecke/status/1243180827061760000

So let's start the #QuantumDiagrams Twitter course, I'll repost my first two Tweets to keep all within one thread.

- bob coecke (@coecke)
